verses.text: \w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* worshipper \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* will \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="H3018"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* work \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*: \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* will \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w all|strong="H0398"\w* will \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5439"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H0802"\w* fertile \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* inmost \w parts|strong="H3411"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5439"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w your|strong="H5439"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w plants|strong="H8363"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w your|strong="H5439"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

\w See|strong="H2009"\w*! \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* worshipper \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* send \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* children's \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
